title: I'd Make You Squeak (5U101)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert 2 [Sauron] Orcs. Plays to your support area. The Shadow number of each site is +1 for each wound on a Hobbit (limit +3).
Lore:	”'If I had my way, you'd wish you were dead now.'”
Rarity:	U
